activities: Institute for Healthcare Optimization (IHO) collects, uses and otherwise processes personal information received about individual contacts of former, current and prospective customers for the following purposes: (1)purchase and delivery of IHO products and services, (2) customer support, (3) technical support of IHO products and services, (4) operating the IHO website, (5) providing access to IHO website, products or services, (6) providing education on IHO products or services or related products or services, and (7) performing marketing activities and otherwise communicating information regarding IHO products or services.
industrysector: Health Care Services - (HCS)Education & Training - (EDS)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
